FuncDef: The display multicast statistics command displays global PIM entry statistics. The display multicast statistics command displays global PIM entry statistics.
CLIs: display multicast global { pimsm | pimdm | all } statistics
Examples: <HUAWEI> display multicast global pim sm statistics
ExtraInfo:
To check PIM entry restriction and statistics in PIM-SM mode, run the display multicast global pim sm statistics command.
To check PIM entry restriction and statistics in PIM-DM mode, run the display multicast global pim dm statistics command.
To check PIM entry restriction and statistics in all modes, run the display multicast global all statistics command.
